name: 2023 Int'l Conference on Preschool Education and Child Development
content: 2023 Int'l Conference on Preschool Education and Child Development (PECD 2023) will be held during Oct. 27-29, 2023 in Xi'an, China. This Conference will cover issues on Preschool Education and Child Development. The aim of PECD 2023 is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their latest research results and advanced research methods.
